original: @60a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje rnam ba joms ba la phyag tshal lo

original: klu chen po rnams kyi sprin dral ba'i cho ga bsgrub par 'dod pas bdag nyid rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa dmar por bsgyur la snying po bsdus pa'i sngags bzlas te /
analyzed: klu chen po rnams kyi sprin dral ba cho ga sgrub ba dod ba bdag nyid rdo rje rnam ba joms ba dmar por sgyur la snying po sdud ba sngags bzlas te

original: yungs kar la klu chen po rnams kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bur dmigs te /
analyzed: yungs kar la klu chen po rnams kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bur dmigs te

original: nam mkha' la gtor bas klu rnams kyi snying gnas phu: zhes pa'i yi ge grangs med pa 'phros pas sprin gyi tshogs rnam par bshigs te /

original: nam mkha' rang dangs su song bar dmigs so //
analyzed: nam mkha rang dangs su gro ba dmigs so

original: khro bo'i sdang mig bzlog la sngags zlos shing mdzub ris bya /
analyzed: khro bo sdang mig bzlog la sngags zlos shing mdzub ris byed

original: kha nas me'i 'od zer dpag tu med pa 'phros pas bar snang thams cad med dpung gis khengs par dmigs so //
analyzed: kha nas me d zer dpog tu med ba phro ba ba snang thams cad med dpung gis kheng ba dmigs so

original: gang bsrung ba'i phyogs su phur bul khro bo bcur dmigs la gdab bo //
